data.comment: The match has started at Chuncheon Songam Sports Town.
Daegu's Cesinha has run offside.
In the minute 4, Gangwon to take a throw-in in Daegu territory.
Gangwon have been awarded a corner by Yong-woo Kim.
Gangwon are coming forward and Seo Min-woo gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 5, Yong-woo Kim awards Daegu a goal kick.
Can Gangwon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Daegu's half?
Daegu awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 8, Yong-woo Kim signals a free kick to Daegu in their own half.
Free kick Gangwon.
Throw-in for Gangwon in the half of Daegu.
In the minute 10, Throw-in for Daegu at Chuncheon Songam Sports Town.
Free kick for Daegu in their own half.
Yong-woo Kim blows against Gangwon's Shin Kwang-hoon for offside.
In the minute 17, Cesinha for Daegu gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Gangwon at Chuncheon Songam Sports Town.
Free kick for Gangwon in their own half.
In the minute 18, Daegu have a goal kick.
Gangwon awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Cesinha of Daegu is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 19, It's a goal kick for the away team in Chuncheon.
Yong-woo Kim awards the away team a throw-in.
Corner awarded to Daegu.
In the minute 27, Yong-woo Kim signals a Gangwon throw-in in Daegu's half.
Gangwon drive forward but Seo Min-woo is judged offside.
Ball safe as Gangwon is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 28, Throw-in Gangwon.
Throw-in for Gangwon in their own half.
Yong-woo Kim signals a free kick to Daegu in their own half.
In the minute 34, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Gangwon close to the penalty box.
Gangwon's Kim Kyung-jung misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Daegu goal kick.
In the minute 37, Goal kick for Gangwon at Chuncheon Songam Sports Town.
Yong-woo Kim awards Daegu a goal kick.
Free kick for Daegu in the half of Gangwon.
In the minute 42, Corner awarded to Daegu.
Daegu have been awarded a corner by Yong-woo Kim.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 45, Kim Dae-won for Daegu is whistled offside.
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Can Gangwon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Daegu's half?
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
The second-half is underway in Chuncheon.
Lee Jae-kwon is replacing Seo Min-woo for the home team.
In the minute 47, Daegu awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Gangwon in their own half.
Corner awarded to Daegu.
In the minute 51, Edgar Silva (Daegu) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to Daegu.
Daegu awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 57, Lee Byeong-keun (Daegu) is making a first substitution, with Lee Jin-hyun replacing Shin Chang-moo.
Gangwon's Cho Jae-wan is on target but unsuccessful.
Lee Yeong-jae is on a sub for Cho Ji-hun for Gangwon.
In the minute 59, Throw-in for Daegu at Chuncheon Songam Sports Town.
Yong-woo Kim signals a throw-in for Gangwon, close to Daegu's area.
Throw-in for Gangwon close to the penalty box.
In the minute 63, Cho Jae-wan of Gangwon smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Yong-woo Kim signals a free kick to Daegu in their own half.
Kim Kyung-jung is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 67, Kim Kyung-jung (Gangwon) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Chae Gwang-hoon.
Yong-woo Kim signals a free kick to Daegu just outside Gangwon's area.
Daegu advance rapidly upfield but Yong-woo Kim blows for offside.
In the minute 69, Ball safe as Daegu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Chuncheon a free kick has been awarded the away team.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Chuncheon.
In the minute 72, Ball goes out of play for a Gangwon goal kick.
Yong-woo Kim signals a free kick to Daegu.
Throw-in for Gangwon in their own half.
In the minute 74, Daegu have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in Daegu.
Throw-in high up the field for Gangwon in Chuncheon.
Daegu have a goal kick.
In the minute 77, Gangwon have been awarded a corner by Yong-woo Kim.
In the minute 77, Play has been interrupted briefly in Chuncheon to check on Kim Seon-min, who is grimacing with pain.
Dejan Damjanovic (Daegu) has replaced the possibly injured Kim Seon-min at Chuncheon Songam Sports Town.
Throw-in for Gangwon in the half of Daegu.
Yong-woo Kim awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 78, Yong-woo Kim signals a Daegu throw-in in Gangwon's half.
Goal kick for Gangwon at Chuncheon Songam Sports Town.
The away team replace Tsubasa Nishi with Ryu Jae-moon.
In the minute 85, Yong-woo Kim awards Gangwon a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Gangwon.
In the minute 88, Daegu awarded a free kick in their own half.
Gangwon have been awarded a corner by Yong-woo Kim.
Gangwon drives forward and Kim Seung-dae gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Daegu goal kick.
Daegu have a goal kick.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Chuncheon.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Chuncheon.
Free kick for Daegu in their own half.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 0-0.
